definitions.definition: A pad worn on the inner surface of women's underpants , up against the vulva , during a low-flow day of the menstrual period, designed to absorb small, spotty quantities of menstrual fluid , in contrast to a tampon or sanitary napkin , worn on heavy-flow days.
A similar product designed to absorb urine for women with light bladder leakage.

main_definition: A pad worn on the inner surface of women's underpants , up against the vulva , during a low-flow day of the menstrual period, designed to absorb small, spotty quantities of menstrual fluid , in contrast to a tampon or sanitary napkin , worn on heavy-flow days.
secondary_definitions: A similar product designed to absorb urine for women with light bladder leakage.
